title: Actress Florence Segal tasted Mapaseka Koetle-Nyokong’s breast milk
text:
Actress Florence Segal tasted Mapaseka Koetle-Nyokong’s breast milk share this

Cape Town - Actress Florence Segal and Mapaseka Koetle-Nyokong have taken their friendship to the next level – Florence has tasted Mapaseka’s breast milk.



Mapaseka shared a video the two besties took three years ago while Mapaseka was still breast feeding her now almost three-year-old daughter.

Florence was surprised that it tasted similar to "normal" dairy milk.

"Actually, it’s milk. It’s just milk," she says in the video.

Mapaseka posted the video on Florence’s birthday.

"God knows how much I love this girl, re tswa hole ... happy birthday @florencesegal Modimo a ho fe matla Modimo a ho boloke..." she wrote in the caption.

READ MORE: Scandal! actress Mapaseka Koetle-Nyokong celebrates her 30th birthday in style

Mapaseka also explained that at the time, her baby was far away from her and she had to pump the milk because her breasts were full.
